posts.author: Pelagius
posts.content:
Does anyone here use it? What are your experiences with it, if so?

I remmeber I downloaded it and gave it a short try many years ago, but it was at a a time that I stopped playing NWN. I later lost all saves, modules, characters, etc. I had and was considering downloading it again.

I'm guessing it's good for characters you use on the reg, but it seems that most of you play different characters for different modules. I also didn't found a reference to it on this forums.

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
Try this link Pelagius, the keep is more like a persistent world instead of just another trainer but it never got updated to my knowledge. Still, you can read the comments from the old Vault to get an idea what is like. I remember I used I for a while but that was a decade ago...

ftp://neverwintervault.org/rolovault/pr ... index.html
